website_summaries.verdict: This affordable men's thermal set does a good job of keeping your skin warm, as long as it's not too cold out.
pros: This thermal set stands out for the fact that it's lighweight yet pleasantly warm
The thermal knit material helps to keep heat close to the body
cons: Several owners have found that while this set does a good job of protecting against moderately cold temps, they're a bit thin for very cold days

customer_reviews.title: Good thermals
customer_reviews.text: These are good thermals. Very warm and comfortable once your second layer is on. By themselves, they seem to fit very strange. The chest, arms, and legs are all the right size but the top fits tight under my armpits and the waistband sits right at the top of my buttocks and will not come up to my waist no matter how hard I pull. However, once I have on my second layer of clothes, they feel like a perfect fit and don't slide around at all underneath my top layer. Definitely follow their directions when it comes to ordering sizes. I usually am an L but I ordered an XL and it's the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mazzara

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: The description advises the buyer to buy one size larger. I did not. It fits, but it's just a little snug. I should have listed. My fault. But it does keep me warm, and it's way better than my prior set, which I put on my gift list as one size smaller, and they're pretty snug. So when they tell you to order one size larger, do it.
customer_reviews.author: K Chieff

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: I found these very comfortable and wear them for sleepwear in Maine during cool seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Mcquarrie

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son along with some big snow overalls to keep him warm in 20 degree weather. Fit great and do their job
customer_reviews.author: Beth Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present for my husband and the fit is perfect. More than that the shirt and pants keep him toasty. I’m ordering more of these from this seller :)

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: love this product, fits well and definitely helped during the colder weather.

customer_reviews.title: The size was perfect, the material was not scratchy and the garment ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect, the material was not scratchy and the garment kept me warm in single digit temps and minus degree windchill.
customer_reviews.author: BillK

customer_reviews.title: Purchase something else
customer_reviews.text: I've had these items for about three weeks or so...I don't have to wear them all the time yet. After just 3 washings, one seam is already separating on the shirt. Pretty lousy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Randall L. Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Horrible fit
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pair of Rocky thermal (waffle design) I purchased about 5years ago Because they fit and wear so well I decided to buy them again. These are not the same shape /size/ This are horrible. I wish I would have returned them. I’m a medium size man ordered the large just like the pairs I have. There not made correctly. There’s all this room up front and nothing in the back end. The waste band won’t even reach in the back. Like there falling all the time. And I have a small backside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly long enough, incredibly tight fit
customer_reviews.text: WAY too small. I'm 6'1" and the shirt which was incredibly tight had arms that ended about sux inches from my wrists. The pants were an absolute joke. Got them to my knees where there was no more give to go any further. These are not remotely close to American sizes. Maybe if you're in middle school give them a shot. Very disappointed. It does say order a size up but the length of these are a problem as well as the sizing. I guess if you're very young or if you have short arms and legs then perhaps you can gamble with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad cut design. The bottoms are way too low.
customer_reviews.text: The length of the limbs are good, but the top doesn't extend far enough and the bottoms waist band is way too low to keep coverage when bending over or even sitting. The bottoms waist will continually find itself just below the top of the but crack. As an undergarment, this puts the waist band well below the waist and waist band of other garments used to layer. Worst set of thermals I've had. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Van

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not U.S. Sizes, order 2 or 3 sizes bigger than what you wear.
customer_reviews.text: So I like my clothes loose fitting and roomy. I have a colostomy, and so I need my clothes loose so my C-bag isn t being strangled or smashed against me. It can become very uncomfortable if my clothes are not loose. I purchased 2 sizes bigger for this reason, which the tag says it's 2 sizes bigger than what I wear, but it's not. It actually seems to fit me as if it's my normal size. The price seems great but they are 2 to 3 sizes smaller than U.S. sizes. So purchase them 2 or 3 sizes bigger than you normally wear in U.S. Sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Nadja Ravenstar

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Small + Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The first thing you notice is this that these are very thin. The top ripped the first day I wore it. These run very small. I were a medium of most brand which typically fit perfectly or slightly large. This was way too tight, which is what you think would cause the rip. However the rip that occured was one youd expect. I would expect it to happen at the armpit since it was way too small. These ripped at my tricep due to how thing the material is. Would not recommend buying this product due to how thin and low quality it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you warm but a few rips already
customer_reviews.text: Nothing too scientific here. Got the set, after wearing five or six nights I noticed there were two holes in the left armpit, and one in the right wrist. Showing some pics to prove I'm on the level. Since these are just for some practical warmth and not for fashion, a few holes don't bother me much, they will when they get larger I suppose. I was emailed asking for my review, so here it is. Frankly I'm tired of being hounded for reviews over and over again for every item I purchase at Amazon. Take it as you will.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Fallon

customer_reviews.title: fit is small
customer_reviews.text: These are mediocre long handles. They fit way small I normally wear an extra large. I am 6'2" and 210 and got these in a 2XL and they fit ok. Did not shrink too much Washed in cold water and dried on low heat. The only real disappointment is the holes I have in two of the shirts in the underarm area. I probably will not buy another pair,I have 2 now and that is enough if they are gonna sprout holes that quickly. There is only one long handle maker that I will buy from now on. And I have never been able to find them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: If you can sew... this item will be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately both times I bought these they came with razor cuts, and seams already coming undone. Both shirts under the armpits had holes in them right out of the package as well as the seams of the sleeves on both of them. Box cutter cuts in the pants on one pair as well. Very disappointing... ordered black... got navy. They are warm homes and all I guess... and if you can sew up holes when you just paid 20 bucks well maybe it's worth it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lightnin

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in the crotch!
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and fit well! But what a disappointment to put them on and find they come with a hole! Not worth returning it but I hate having to sew a brand new item, because the quality control is not up to par!

They are not true to size, flimsy andput together very oddly. The top was maybe a size small(labeled large) and bottoms at super baggy in the front and have NO room for any one with a skinny rear as he has let alone anyone with a butt. We had a lot of laughs when he “modeled” them for me. He said he wouldn’t even donate them to a homeless cold perso cuz they were so uncomfortable. Do not buy. They’re not “cheap” $ either.

customer_reviews.title: Size might an issue

The waffle trapped the heat well and if it wasn't for the snugness around the chest the set would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gerald packard

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm

However i would have expected a 5X to have been a much better fit than it turned out to be. I purchased this for my son who is 6' 4" and 300 lbs and is quite a tight fit but its very warm and will be worn underneath his regular clothes.

The shirt seems to be fine the bottoms are a little too tight on his legs, because he has big muscles in his legs. I think the material seems to be on the thin side, not thick like the other brands I have bought. They are a pretty bright blue color.

customer_reviews.title: One of the best buys in a long time

Really impressed me how warm they got, and I am cold natured,once the pants went on. Wore them all day and there was no ,sliding,binding, or crimping.

customer_reviews.title: small fit even when ordering oversize

customer_reviews.title: I do not know which base layer I liked better. These felt more cotton like even thought ...

customer_reviews.title: Good!

customer_reviews.title: Warm and good fit, but very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and warm, and fit well. However, the quality of this Made in China material is very poor. After 4 washings (hand washing in cold water), the stitching near the armpits is already coming off. I'll be lucky if they last one winter season. These thermals are good if you are a throw-away person. Use them for one winter then throw them away. I'll probably use them to clean my car this coming summer.

customer_reviews.title: Small

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermal
customer_reviews.text: Loved them great fit and keeps good and warm simply love them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband he actually wears the thermal a lot warm durable great fit
customer_reviews.author: tracey foxx

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy. These went to someone who gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Warm and cozy. These went to someone who gets up early every morning for work, leaving before the sun is even thinking of rising. It's the time of day when it's always cold, and the wind can be bitter. These were a life saver, and they are warmer than expected. They aren't skin tight, but close enough that they won't interfere with normal clothes either.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the warmth coming from such lightweight material. Only issue is that the shoulder of the sleeve threads broke loose the very first time he wore it. I am going to attempt to fix it but if not, will order in the next size to see if that doesn't give better movement in the sleeve. After wearing this and then his old pair, he said his old pair felt like he had a diaper on. :)
customer_reviews.author: From OHIO

customer_reviews.title: They were of poor quality and very very small for the size listed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of all the frigid weather were having. They were of poor quality and very very small for the size listed. The waist was to be at least 10 inches larger than it really is. I bought them very large in case of shrinkage. They would not even fit a teenager! I was going to send them back, but found a kid they fit and made them a present. I think they should check their size measurements because they are way off.
customer_reviews.author: mom of five

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy These
customer_reviews.text: This item doesn’t even come close to sizing picked. I ordered a men’s 3XL and it is more fitted to a ladies Lg. This product is also a discontinued item from Rocky that was made exclusively for Walmart. Due to problems with sizing Walmart no longer sold these and the remaining stock was sold off to other sellers. In other words don’t waste your money on these
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Product was great. My fiance works in a freezer warehouse and loved the thermal 2 piece. The shirt was a little snug. I would like if the sizes could be picked individually.
customer_reviews.author: FatBluetifulPrincess

customer_reviews.title: top labeled 4xl and fit like youth 16
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a hunting trip and didn't get them until I arrived at the hunting location. The top was labeled as a 4xl and I ordered a Medium. It was TIGHT--seemed like it was really a youth 16. The bottoms fit like they should. Marginally okay in terms of heat retention. Would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: not warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought these long johns and when I opened them you can hold them up and you can see right thru them. They are not warm at all. Dont waste your money look for something different that may keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The pants fit perfectly but the shirt was a little small. I had this problem with the last pair so I ordered a size up. I like them overall just wish the shirt was a tad bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Very small, not high quality
customer_reviews.text: The material is thin, with many loose threads along the seams. The most disappointing part is that a size XL was way too small on me, and I am only 65 inches tall! XL in other brands normally is somewhat large on me, but I like that kind of fit. On the Rocky top, the sleeve length was good [on me], but the body length comes only to my navel, which makes it very uncomfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: it's a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The fabric is paper thin and the size is less than one half of what is advertised. This product should not be allowed on Amazon because it's a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: bad stitching I gave these to someone that fit them the stitching came undone in an hr now there's a hole in the seem
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Run really small
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom seemed mismatched I usually take a large and the top wouldn’t even fit over my head. Bottom probably a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Stoneyrjg

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son for cold weather climbing. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for cold weather climbing. First, it's supposed to be form fitting, but had this been even a tiny bit smaller, it would've been too small. Order a size up. Second... they're thin. You could see my son's tats through the fabric. We bought them for insulation and they are NOT warm. If you're looking for warm long johns, do not buy these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size - Size up if you buy
customer_reviews.text: Quality product but it is NOT true to size. You should probably size up one to two sizes meaning if you are a small then you need a Med or Large.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: What I've noticed is that the stitching isn't the greatest. After only a month
customer_reviews.text: These things run small. The tops smaller than the bottoms. What I've noticed is that the stitching isn't the greatest. After only a month, it's starting to come apart at the seams. Wherever the panels meet, it's starting to get holes already. :/ Otherwise I like them.
customer_reviews.author: chris romano

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit, ripped almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The legs and arms were shorter than appropriate for this type of garment and the inseam ripped almost immediately. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: QDpie

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.text: My brother should be a medium, but I thought it would be safer to buy him a large. The large was too tight in the top and bottom, despite the sizing on the package saying that he should really be a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Gray

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XL (waist 42-44) taking into account shrinkage from washing. Out of the package I tried on the long-johns and they were so small I couldn't even get the waistband around my waist. I usually wear a medium so XL should have been more than enough to fit, wrong! Go to the store and size up what you wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick B

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one size up (as suggested), not sure if three sizes up would've been big enough (especially the top), pants wearable but small as well, just not as much. Quality of product seemed okay but time is needed to really determine. Because of the size disparity, I will not be ordering this particular brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Fish

customer_reviews.title: Fits small.
customer_reviews.text: My husband normally wears an xl in regular shirts. Ordered the xl and it was so small that he ripped holes in the armpits the first time he tried to wear it. Material is very soft and kept him warm as he works outside. Recommended, but just order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Swanigan

customer_reviews.title: Thermal under wear that keeps you warm
customer_reviews.text: The size runs a little small. My pair looks it they were sprayed on. But they work.Next time I order I will go a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Darn, I wish I would have read the reviews before ordering. The guy in the picture must be wearing an X-Large. I bought a medium and the shirt is so tight that I can barely breath. The pants are tight too but wearable, they may stretch out with wear. If you order these, order one size larger or risk strangulation :)
customer_reviews.author: Dan Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Little small, clothing does that sometimes, excellent product I can live with the size. I'd buy it again, larger size though. I've never purchased long johns before I should have.
customer_reviews.author: scooter o
